page.title: 09The River Severn CONT
page.content: Linking up with the A.442 is the main Wolverhampton road. As a large number of the towns population commute each day,these roads are in constant use. Our school is the only primary school on the eastern side of the river.The Queens Parlor over looks our school and Lowtown which is built up with houses, a few shops and some small buisnesses. Lowtown is not the oldest part of Bridgnorth as is the Hightown of Bridgnorth, but this once important inland port carried all the raw materials for the raging furnaces of the Industrial Revolution which had found its birth upriver.
